overview: Drake(Raphael Cosme), a soldier, is tormented by his Father's stories on the world's demise passing it to his long-time friend Aaron (Aaric Lupo). After the events of the 2014 Los Angeles Disaster, Mushino hasn't been seen since, as new threats rise up when the Phractus Leader(Jeremy W.) starts a new revolution against the United States. What will these chain of awful events lead to on the planet's vicious cycle of nature........?
title: Mushino
